Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute near California/Wellington
ShortDescription: 94 California buses temp. rerouted NB: California, Diversey, Western, Belmont, & Rockwell; SB: Rockwell, Addison, Western, Belmont, & California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near California/Wellington

Northbound buses will operate via California, Diversey, Western, Belmont, & Rockwell

Southbound buses will operate via Rockwell, Addison, Western, Belmont, & California.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at Archer/47th
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, 47th, Kedzie and Archer, due to street blockage near Archer/47th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Archer, 47th, Kedzie and Archer, due to street blockage near Archer/47th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #47 47th Temporary Westbound Reroute near Archer/47th
ShortDescription: Westbound 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Kedzie, 55th, Pulaski and 47th, due to street blockage near Archer/47th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Kedzie, 55th, Pulaski and 47th, due to street blockage near Archer/47th.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
